title: LPL Financial and Gaines Financial Group Welcome Financial Advisor Matthew Fountain
content:
Boca Raton, FL (PR Buzz) September 25, 2015 -- LPL Financial LLC, the nation's largest independent broker-dealer*, a custodian for registered investment advisors (RIAs), 

Fountain will open a new office in Sarasota, FL and plans to add a second advisor at this location. Fountain provides
